title: Spurt in travel spurs credit card spends overseas
description: Overseas credit card spending has surged significantly, outpacing increases in prepaid payment instruments (PPIs) and debit cards over the past two years. This growth is attributed to a rebound in travel post-COVID-19 and attractive rewards offered by credit card issuers, despite higher taxes on international credit card transactions under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme.
